- not sure if this was from starting up or closing the intro

Dejan,
I added the log of the exception over the weekend, I believe. (it was an empty 
Exception block)
Was this exception supposed to happen?

Actually, the block should have stayed empty. The exception is thrown not only 
when the value is not a valid int, but also if it does not exist. I added the 
comment in the 'catch' documenting that we are ignoring the exception 
willingly.

traces.message: There is no setting associated with the key "introLaunchBar.location"
